ComicInfo.Summary:
WARP FACTOR TEN! The new issue of 2000 AD is out on Wednesday and in this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Judge Dredd: Blood of Emeralds by Michael Carroll, Colin MacNeil, Chris Blythe and Annie Parkhouse; Absalom: Under A False Flag by Gordon Rennie, Tiernan Trevallion, and Simon Bowland; Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles – Primordial by Pat Mills, Simon Davis, and Ellie De Ville; Helium by Ian Edginton, D’Israeli, and Ellie De Ville.
Cover: Simon Davis
Judge Dredd - Blood of Emeralds (Part One) (Michael Carroll - Colin Macneil)Absalom - Under A False Flag (Part One) (Gordon Rennie - Tiernen Trevallion)Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles Book Two - Primordial (Part Eleven) (Pat Mills - Simon Davis)Helium (Part One) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)
